House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07863
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING SECTIONS 79, 82, 84, 85, AND 86 OF BATAS PAMBANSA BLG. 881, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE OMNIBUS ELECTION CODE
ABSTRACT : Amends the Omnibus Election Code by incorporating certain provisions in using digital media for communication and electioneering.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZUBIRI, MANUEL F.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sangcopan (000 2018-10-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2018-07-30
